name: HiVeMiND (DEMBERG)
description:
Is a movement just the only way? NO! In HiVeMiND with one action there are more than one possibilities! Use your brain and imagination and take advantage of the environment around you and solve the puzzles. Aw! We also have an "EDITOR" mode to build your own UNIQUE levels. Let the fun begin!!

Instructions
  • WASD or Arrows to Move
Credits
  • Programmer : Giorgos Pagalis 
  • Animation/Art/UI : Rea Papadopetrou 
  • Level Design: Michael Katoglou
  • Music/Sound Design: Denia Palaiologou
